import React from 'react' import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; function Navbar() { function showMenu(){ const menu = document.querySelector("#list-menu"); menu.classList.toggle("hidden"); } return (
github users
  • home
  • about
  • contact
) } export default Navbar;
